description: The Serbian bellflower, also known as Campanula poscharskyana 'Stella', is an incredible plant with deep blue/purple, star-shaped flowers and green lush foliage. Its beauty is beyond compare - it brightens any garden with its radiant color and delicate petals. Its lovely flowers bloom independently and make a stunning sight in the warmer months, when the foliage grows to its fullest. Additionally, this extraordinary species is drought-resistant and is quite low-maintenance, meaning anyone can create a stunning garden in no time. This extraordinary beauty can surely enhance any garden with its breathtaking beauty.
